values:
ok nto going to use this journal anymore... its going going gone


soon


just posting this so everyone knows that this one will be dead to me.

i have another livejournal.

i will be dual livejournaling.. we'll see how that goes. this one is better for lunenburg related stuff.

bah. im so tired. i woke up at 7:12 today. way to go lex! needless to say, i threw on some clothes and literally ran out the door. i didnt even get to take my morning shower! i hate when that happens. so i took a shower just now and it was wonderful. Lil Abner tonight. so far its been lame. for some reason i just dont have the patience for it. and last night was the worst. katz was trying to choreograph the scene where abner gets hit on the head with a champagne bottle and it just wasn't working. so of course everyone gets bored and what not. seriously, i think we tried a dozen scenarios and none of them worked at all. i think thats the time when you say.. ok new musical! this one sucks! it's fun to actually do it... but the idea is stupid. i dont know how much sense that makes. everyone's at the hockey game except for me. boo. when i came home from school i had a huuge craving for cheese and crackers.. well we had the crackers but no cheese.. except for the gross moldy kind that i believe is not fit for human consumption. so how does one solve this problem? simply go out and buy cheese. and i did. vermont extra sharp cheddar. my cheese and crackers were superb. i want to watch saved.. or billy elliot. "i wont to be a bahllay dahnceh.. its not just foh' poffs!" haha im a poff. no thats a lie... ah, mon dieu, c'est fini, c'est fini!

im not going to complain in this entry.. boy that will be hard.

been awake since 6:30-7 ish yesterday morning... i kind of feel like im floating.. i dont think thats good. ew and its just gross flying on a plane all night, blagh! i do not recomend it.

im so happy to be home though... except Larka ate my Lil Abner script, fucking inbred fuck, im going to euthanize her ass... and the rest of her! also one of the animals shat on my comforter. i was about to jump from a window. whatever im washing all my sheets and getting a new comforter. i dont know what im gonna do about the script though. i'll be honest i cried.. no thats a lie. i bawled my eyes out and screamed like a maniac. can you imagine? quite the picture.

i think i want to get one of those webshots things like kathryn and everyone, because its easier than resizing them and then posting them here. and i have some fun ones of AZ. meh, i'll find someway of doing it.

aaah i have so much stuff to do.


and im frusterated!

haha! you guys are all in snow and im in a tshirt!!!

sorry i had to get that out of my system. the weather has been great though. we're staying at the best western and martha is being surprisingly tolerant and tolerable. unfortunately our room doesnt have high speed internet (its the ONLY one) so i have to come down to the lobby to hit up the internet and do all that good stuff. it doesnt work on my computer for some reason though soooooo im on my mom's. and it doesnt have aim. im aimless! 

i kind of miss lunenburg which is weird. i feel terrible for missing Lil' Abner. i think ms, katz is ready to kick me out. whatever. she can shove it right now, im attending to my decrepit grandmother! seriously that woman weighs less than a sparrow. she doesnt eat. poor old lady.

the bell hop is trying to talk to me. aah! save me! earlier today some other hotel worker tried talking to me and i made the sign of the cross with my fingers and booked it!. kidding. but i was like seriously being anti- social. i stuck my face into the computer and pretended like i was working really hard. i was polite though.

whatever im not going to justify my anti-social-ness. boo

i actually have a lot of ideas for this essay. its coming along quite well. but i miss talking to everyone!! aaah! and i tried to get the aol page to work so that i could do it all temporary style. but that didnt work.

kelly called me today. i think it was the best surprise ever. to hear someone from lunenburg call me. yes, i have my cellphone. im starting to think that no one wants me to come home. everyone's hoping i sort of get eaten by a rattle snake or prickled to death by a cactus. 

kidding. anyway, i miss everyone and cant wait to get home. im thinking of stuff that i should bring back as prizes for everyone.. i found these pretty glass rings.. but they were super expensive. 

ok im leaving im really going to go and look for this stuff for the essay.

miss everyone! huuuge hugs and kisses from me to you!

leaving for cactus-a-go-go-land today! yippeee! im bringing my comp. we're inseperable. compy!!! yay!!! i need to name it. any good name ideas for my comp? greg's computer is named percy. i think percy has a homosexual tendencey, but hey whatever works. my comp is deffinitely a boy. its not exactly girly. this is me being happy for the trip! singing "send in the clowns" look at those lips!!!! those were for the anonymous poster.. and evan. do i love myself, most deffinitely. am i in love with myself? no. .. although i am pretty hot... kidding!

had dinner tonight at Filho's Cucina. c'etait tres bon! i had the smoked turkey panini and everyone else got pasta. kristen and vanessa's looked gooooood! tomorrow i leave for rattle-snake-a-go-go-land/ cactus-a-go-go-land/ AZ. kinda excited it will be good to get away. however i'm getting away with my mother... hmmm maybe not so good. at least im gonna miss the snow. sooo i got a haircut this afternoon... i dont like it, decide for yourself. i think its mullet-trocious: the front: the side: the back: in a pony:

oooh chloe, you are a funny one. that happened at like midnight when we were online, yea she said that outloud in monotone. funniest fucking thing ever.... although it might just have been funny because i was a little bit buzzed... i was not drunk. i didnt have that much to drink, a glass of champagne and a debate-able 5-6 cups of the peach schapps smoothie. i wasnt piss ass drunk. i got a good case of the giggles though. we should have more neighbor nights, it was wicked fun. and!!! we didnt make any stupid phone calls!!! superb! i might have made one... last night before chloe's i camera whored it up. ooh im so vain. at least i come by it honestly. tonight is girls night out. we're going out to dinner somewhere nice.. maybe. ite bcome a huge fiasco. we'll have to see what happens. haha im feeling flirty, thats always good. not!

i figured out how to use the symbols in my entries. haha1 so beware if random symbols start popping up in my entries.

haha.. last nights entry.. wohoo

and the anonymous posters! i love them! i dont think i want to know who they are. it will ruin the fun.

bah Lil Abner at noon today.

shit i have to pick up my father from the car dealership
booo!
the bumbling fool strikes again. wahoo!

for some reason this week went by really fast. which was good i was sick of school and wating for vaca. but now that its here i dont know what to do with myself.  im leaving for Arizona on thursday. mother daughter bonding! shoot me in the face. i think im gonna bring my comp just because i need to do that effing essay. thanks hannigan. 

so i havent done much this weekend. i suppose that that is mostly my fault. on friday night we (or who was left of we, kath, vaness and meesh and i) went to kristen's house for sad and mopey girl's night. we have brownie sundaes, soooo fucking good, and watched One True Thing and The Notebook. One True Thing wasnt so sad probably because i didnt really follow it. i left halfway through the notebook because i had work the next morning. it always sounds like a good idea to have a sleepover and then go straight to work. but i hate being all gross in the morning and blah after a sleepover with responsibility cattle- prodding me around that early in the morning. i'd rather just wake up from my own bed and shower and hop into the truck and go straight to work. anyway, thats my rationale for friday night.

tonight i was supposed to do something\... ended up driving around for 2 1/2 hours. yep that was fun. so i went home and watched Girl With a Pearl Earring with my mother who had never seen it and always ruins movies by wanting to know whats gonna happen next or thinking out loud. i could have smacked her. but i controlled myself.  tonight was lame. 

what did everyone else do this weekend?

tuesday night: slumber at chlo flo's! the first neighbor sleepover woot woot!!!!! partay! actually i bet it will be relatively quiet because poor chlo will be all partied out.  :(

bored. maybe i'll watch a film. cinema paradiso perhaps. i love that movie, its soo cute! makes me cry everytime. or saved i havent watched that in a while. 

bah, emo pic. hahahah! i'll take pics of myself. or make new user pics. that always cheers me up.

look meesh i updated at 6:58 this morning!

im going to reread that book. the opera was wonderful, it had like 50 super psycho talented kids in it. and the little boy who played the Little Prince was amazing. oh i could have just died watching it. it was very beautiful!

i'll update later today...

You Belong in 1966
1966
If you scored... 1950 - 1959: You're fun loving, romantic, and more than a little innocent. See you at the drive in! 1960 - 1969: You are a free spirit with a huge heart. Love, peace, and happiness rule - oh, and drugs too. 1970 - 1979: Bold and brash, you take life by the horns. Whether you're partying or protesting, you give it your all! 1980 - 1989: Wild, over the top, and just a little bit cheesy. You're colorful at night - and successful during the day. 1990 - 1999: With you anything goes! You're grunge one day, ghetto fabulous the next. It's all good!
What Year Do You Belong In?

i'm not going to make it to the end of the musical. i will bet you a million dollars.

i need a vacation. from everything. i wonder if there is a drug that will knock you out for a week. if so please tell me, i'll take it in an instant.

ok so can i just say that i have an obsession with peter pan. i mean he's a guy who runs around in tights fighting pirates and he can fly! hot! can you imagine the sex??

kidding! but i do love my background. im not completely through with the redesign though. but i like how it is now, so i will leave it. anyway. do comment let me know if there is anything that looks terrible. i took me liek 8 years to make this stupid picture! haha

nothing to do tonight. went to see finding neverland with greg. cried for like the last 20 minutes. but it was beautriful. i want that on DVD. waaaay better than heffalumps.

dan leaves for italy tomorrow. and greg. and the rest of the dead language cult, :'( its soo sad!

im gonna miss them!

but....

57 days till LA BELLE PARIS!!!

can i just start off this entry by saying the very cliche but true statement, "VALENTINES DAY IS LAME". everyone runs around handing out cards with cute messages on them and bags of candy which are promptly scarfed as comfort for lack of a romantic life at all. ... maybe its just me. i dont have a valentine fuck dat, i have a clementine, thats all i need, some good old vitamin C " as we goo onnnn, we rememberrrrr" no, not that Vitamin C, the kind you get from citrus fruits. and calcium. i dont need a valentine, i have strong bones! but really, i mean if this is the one day in the year that you are supposed to say "i love you", isnt that kind of warped? i mean if you love someone shouldn't you tell them that everyday? or at least a little more often than once a year? once a month, maybe. whatever works. and if you feel pressured to say "i love you" on this day then maybe you dont love him/her at all and the whole idea of being with him/her is a bad one. you shouldn't be pressued to say such a strong proclamation. whatever. enough ranting. if i keep going on someone's going to suggest that i write for the lhs newspaper. i can see it now "The Cynicist's View by Lexie Schaefer" opposite megan marcil's column. oh that would be funny. i like megan though, i like her columns. except when she gets personal. like talking about her boyfriend in the last issue of the paper. thats a little too much for me. lil abner tonight. i don't know if i want to jump for joy or shoot myself in the head. i hate learning the songs. well i dont hate doing that. it just takes a long time. i dont like singing while sitting either. it makes it so hard. i like blocking though. walking around and actually acting. movin and shakin. bah. c'est le fin, fin-ally wow terrible pun. lexie you are lamer than __________ im going to wait for the anonymous poster to fill in the blank. i suggest "ef". but thats just me...

i got the sun in the mornin and the moon at night! haha im getting in musical mode, getting stoked for Lil Abner which starts on sunday. aah!

sooo im not going to racap last night. its not worth it. the seniors play was good this year though. im not upset that we lost, our play was a terrible one to perform for a competition. i was just upset that we had to cut so much that the audience didnt understand it. yea.. enough of that. to sum it up i got out all my aggression at the end and had myself a good cry that had been begging to come out for three whole weeks. it was the best cry i've had in a while. ah refreshing.

now i'm in a good mood and i found my watercolors and watercolor paper. super! i wanted to go see the aviator tonight but it seems like a good night to sit in front of a super good movie and eat some annies by myself.  just to recompose a bit.

toniiiiiiight, toonniiiiiiiigggght, the world is wild and bright!!!!!!

haha just in case you forgot that i was insane :)

im feeling alone and totally unoriginal. what do you do when you feel like that? 

im think ing of sketching because i have lost my watercolors and watercolor paper. how careless.

aah anxiety!!

ugh, im feeling so blaah. you know those days where you feel like you had a house drop on your head? yea, one of those days. could just be monday. 

i thought i looked nice today, which raised my self esteem which made it a little better. and i got a 93 on hannigan's bullshit test. fuck yea. i cant believe it, i almost had to pinch myself.

so... im not going to recap the weekend. no need. everyone already has. i will only say that play is out of control. and mike and i built a trellis. done. nice life lex.

saturday was the first full run-through/dress rehearsal. it was fabulous. we all fucked up our lines, gina was called a small elephant by ms. reynolds, there was some stealing of milk by a party who i will not name, and my boobs were suffocated. its going to be impossible to wear that dress. i feel violated in it, blagh! ms. reynolds is a total and utter bitch too. not only did she call gina a small elephant, she told me to steal (yes you heard correctly, steal!!!) a trellis and basically quit at the end of the play(she stormed out of the auditorium and peeled out of the high school lot), not to mention she told brittany/ britney (from canada) that she was only doing this for the money. good to know. by the way "brittney" has been a huge help in the play. she has a lot of creative ideas and its nice to work with someone who has an idea about stage and such. anyway, we caught everything on video tape, fucking hilaaaaaarrrrious.

bored and tired and procrastinating. not a good combination. and everyone is at the hockey game and i couldn't go for like the 80 billionth time. whatever they are probably having fun, having some time off from lexie. she's sooo annoying!!

NEWS FLASH! my boobs are in a lot of pain. the bra i have to wear for the play is like 2 sizes to small and it squeezes my sides and such. 

enough about that nightmare. mike and i built a fucking trellis for it. hells yes its pretty sweet, but it tilts to one side, sad. it looks good though and it has $25 worth of fake flowers on it, Gina helped pick them out and all.

i want to go luging again. in the dark. where the sex offenders and killers have a better chance of snatching me and stringing me up in a tree. oh that was terribly cynical and i apologize. i have been trying to be less cynical, carmie told me to. have i been successful? not at all.

bah, a really long entry where i blabbed about nothing. superb!
im hot and i dont care what anyone says! so ha!

crappy should have a picture of the little white face with poop on it, that would be funny, in an immature 3rd grade kind of way. i stole this from rainy, and some other girl who's lj i found just by following peoples friend's lists. thats always fun when you're procrastinating: Post your name in a comment and i will replay with 1. what i think of you 2.what song you remind me of/ when i hear it i think of you 3. one word that comes to mind when i think of you 4. the color that reminds me of you 5. what i think you'll be doing in 5 years (i made this one up myself out of sheer doredom, but it should be fun) thats all, i think this will be fun, if people actually do it.

this week was a bummer kind of week. not much fun. except for the cake. and today. today was super.

at 10 ish my dad dropped me off at helen's house. it was so much frun to see her and her mom and dad and georgia, it had been ages! helen gave me the grand tour. her room is pimp. except her stairs were super steep and i thought i might fall. but i only fell once today, at the museum off the seesaw.. oh that was gracefull. i got to meet Tony, he's a cutie. then we went to boston to the museum of science because they were having a "girl's get in free day". it was sooo much fun. we made shapes in sand and looked at the dinosaurs and sat in the apollo shuttle dinger and saw the electricity show which was pimp! .. sorta, the girl who was running it was lame. my fave was balancing on the seesaw and freezing our shadows. oh so much fun! helen's hawk was pretty cool also. i hear the city. have i mentioned that yet today???

now im home and bored. i should be writing my essay for hannigan. maaaaahhh i dont want toooo. but there is play tonight from 7-10, boo.

ok deffinitely bored. pb&j time! mmmmm!

oh god, the humping mood icon again. would someone give it something? a dil perhaps? ok, no. kidding. "i makes me wanna get it on!!!!" oooh nugget, i looove vanessa haines.

friday + thursday's schedule = hell

The Cake: Part Deux was awesome. it worked. heck yes! im going to open a little bakery this summer. where i sell cakes and pies and scrambled eggs and pesto, because those are my specialities. today was a good day. well relatively. i was off the walls for the majority of the day sooooo i dont really remember most of it. fun!

im going to figure out how to change the links on my page. someday. not tonight i'm exhausted.

hanny fanny assigned us another essay. im all essayed out for the next 2 months, let me tell you that much.

went to the boys indoor soccer game. super fun. thats like soccer on speed, its hxc. yea i wrote the abbreviation for hardcore, so sue me. i knitted. hanni and my wonderful neighbor ena taught me how to knit, however she does come second to my superest awesome neighbor, who i promise we will have another brownie baking night in. 

im too busy. and i loovvee it.

looovvveee, luurrrrvveee, ya hoo! 

love is a fun word to say, just say it to someone today, tell them you love them. its so strong. 

strong enough for a man but made for a woman... yes folks that is a deoderant slogan. who's super? lexie is super. oh i hate falling out of touch with people. it brings me down.

i have been depressing myself lately. i think im becoming one of those boring people with cardboard personalities. and i think im becoming less and less dependable, which is not what i want to be. dependable in the sense that i'll say i'll do something then neverrrrr do it. which is lame. i also gained 3 pounds since tuesday. at this rate, im going to be a boat.

yesterday was a snowday. woot. kath came over and we goofed around. we attempted to bake this p-i-m-p cake. but it was offended when we said it tasted like a big sugar cookie so it didnt bake for us. i think it was in the oven for 2 1/2 hours. which is deffinitely tooooo long. :( boo. we'll make another one later. for that oh so special occasion.  but im all caked out for now.

i want to go shopping so bad. its become an addiction. i see something i like and i HAVE to have it. there is no getting around it. im terrible. i spend money like it means nothing. i dont even have a spare 20 for gas. which is deffinitely sad. 

my left foot is asleep. its burning.

i downloaded some ani last night, which made my night.

today was hanni's bday.i wanted to go to battle of the bands tonight, unfortunately she was born.  she got some god loot too; some of the best movies in the world, new chuck's, etc. she got a figgen iPod Shuffle, which is like an iPod but $100 dollars less. still, its super nice. not to complain but i didnt even get a cake on my birthday. not all children are created equal. kidding. i cant hate hanni. i love my little banani head. 

this entry is long. today was wednesday's schedule. which bloooooowwwsss. i need another study in the AM im too tired. i seriously feel like i got hit head on by a truck. i shouldnt say that... poor daddy. 

oh shit, i hate days like this, where you hear a song and start crying. fuuuckk me. kristen's bday is tomorrow, but she left today. we'll have to celebrate it later. goodnight. im exhausted. i hate school. and 97% of the people in it. 

any one have any fun ideas? or does someone want to give me a good slap. i need a duffing.

its snowing like whoa.  i think im going to go outside and play in the snow. i havent built an igloo in like 8 years. i deffinitely think one should be constructed. haha! and i'll read my english because i was saving that for study this morning, buuuttt in the event that we dont have weds. schedule tomorrow and we have english first, it might be smart to get it done today. and i think im going to do my scrapbook because i am waaaay behind on that. first though, i need to get dressed and eat. i love how my hair is finally long enough so that i can feel it on my back and if i dont put any de-frizzifying chemicals into it, its soooo soft!

i think its an Auntie Annie's Mac and Cheese type of day... :) 

haha! i just looked outside and for some reason the falling snow made me think of  "HEH BUBBLEEESSSSSSSSS!!!!!"

livejournals are lame. why am i such a hypocrit like that. i guess im just so bored with life at the moment that i feel a desperate need to document it. 

meesh almost died today in french, it was scary.

wow, how boring is this.. very. nothing fun to write about. got our schedules today, my mom is pissed that im not taking chorus. but its stupid to jump in halfway through the year. 

i was going to make Linda and Gina a joint bday cake for stagecraft. but im lame and decided against it. i would need to get chocolate and another pan buuuut i have $11 in my pocket and my truck is out of gas.

i wish i was 5'7"

and not lame.

c'est le fin!

why do we always fight the same fight, over, and over, and over. i think its time that we just let it go. we have changed. and i care very much about you and you have led me to believe that you care about me also. but we always fight about the same exact thing. maybe we should just drop it. its useless. we're such good friends for the most part, we just cant seem to put our past behind us. i was trying to tell you something funny but you exploded. im not angry about what you did and i feel terrible that you were hurt by something i had said.         ... hmm doesnt that sound familiar? because its the same lines back and forth, back and forth eevvvverrrryyytime. i have asked you what you want me to do about it. i have apologized and admitted my wrongs.. but they dont seem to do any good. i can let stuff go, what happened before is different than now. we are different people we have changed. you arent the same as you were in 7th grade. you are much smarter and wittier and a more beautiful person. soo why cant we let it go? we need to agree that everytime we see a conversation going down the same path that we should just end it. its not worth fighting over. we fun for the most part. 

i dont know what to do anymore. you are you, and i am me and i can accept that. 

im not angry with you.

i havent stopped listening to this cd yet. i took pics last night, with daddy's cam. i took one for my other lj. its quite scandalous, but you cant tell what it is... 

i hate sunny days sometimes. they're too bright and make it hard to do stuff
i think the winter should be all dark and gray, or pinky purpley. yea that would be nice, a purple winter. the sky would be sort of lavender all day.  that would be pretty.

maybe i should put some clothes on. i love getting out of the shower, moisturizing, then sitting around in the towel. oh simple pleasures. im going to make a list someday of all my favorite simple pleasures.. maybe later today.

but now im hungry, i havent eaten anything in 16 hours! time to binge! yum yum yum tum! 

i dont think we have any breakfast foods... FRUIT LOOPS!

feel better rainy..  then we can terrorize the city together! woot for dat!

i can hear my dad outside, tractoring. haha what a goon, gets hit by a truck and three days later, he's riding around on his Kubota. its still snowing. i love snow. i want to go for a snow walk. a snow trek! a snow adventure! so the poetry page is up, with three poems on it. im just picking them from random diary entries because i seem to have misplaced a notebook that i used to write poetry in. anyways, make your comments and tell me what you think. maybe i will get up. im think of not showering.. because im lazy and i showered yesterday. and i dont smell.. in fact i smell like sun-ripened raspberries. mom bought me a sweater from Shack's yesterday, its blue and cashmere and nice. im going to wear it today. with a pair of ripped jeans. cute. i'm guessing there is no indoor game today, even if there was i might not go. im still sore from pilates. oh thats a funny story: on friday my mother made an appt for me with deb cookish for pilates bcause its supposed to help my scolioli. well scolioli ravioli is all i have to say to that! but surprisingly, pilates was really pretty fun. and some of it was really hard. i have a tendency to drop my head when im in an all fours position, but that puts strain on my neck and im not supposed to do that... i guess we are going to try to strengthen the other side of my back to straighten it out.. i dont exactly know which side is supposed to be stronger. haha! oh well! mother daughter bonding time is i think what my mom was looking for.. sad. who wants to go on a snow trek?

i created another livejournal, to post my poetry. if i cant act, my plan b is to be a writer. i dont exactly know if i'm a good poet or not. thats why i made a place to post and have people comment. i have a feeling that it was a bad idea and people are just going to be dumb about it, but some of the poems might be lame and some might be ok.. sooo people can post their responses as comments and all. wont it be a blast.

maybe

A - Accent: nope, not really, sometimes i get a PA/MD kind of accent, who knows..

B - Birthplace of Father: Philadelphia, PA i believe

C - Car: 2005 Ford pickup, named Bridget, nicknamed PoS

D - Dad's name: Jeffrey

E - Essential make-up item: CHAPSTICK , i agree with you on this one lex chapstick queen all the way

F - Favorite perfume/cologne: Victoria's Secret Very Sexy, or Clinique Happy

G - Gold or silver: silver 

H - Hometown: Lburg, woot woot

I - Insomnia: its 11:50 on a school night. i am baking a three layered cake and have to do english, french and biotech study.. i think i have a slight case of procrastination if not insomnia

J - Job title: retail!! hi, im a retail associate at shack's clothing in fitchburg, how may i serve you?

K - Kids: love em, hate the ones that are spoiled to the max

L - Living arrangements: umm.. i have my own room?

M - Mum's birthplace: yikes, Newburyport, MA.. i think?

N - Number of apples you've eaten: exactly 498,723,104

O - Overnight hospital stays: neverr

P - Phobia: being alone, unloved, drowning its the worst way to die because you know what is happening to you every second, small bugs, like ticks, lice, small spiders etc. they make me wriggle! 

R - Rings: oh yea, i got one of those rings of power.. but im not going to show you!

S - Siblings: hanni... mary jo, tommy jean, john boy, john boy's mole

T - Time you wake up: 6 ish.

U - Unnatural hair colors you've worn: haha this one time in 6th grade i found some old red hair dye in our bathroom and i dyed my hair red, but it came out looking somewhat like a relaxed carrot top.. very sexy

anyways, mostly what i wanted to say in this entry was basically to defend our play which is sad and pathetic but i am prepared to do it. i have heard lots of complaining and i cant say that i havent been to blame for some of it, but today i really had a good think about it. last year about this time when we were first settling on what we would do for our sophomore competitive class play we were not very happy with the play on the first reading, but we made it fun during the course of the play. the plot sucked but the characters were funny and we had fun doing it and thats all that matters. this year, ok so maybe we dont exactly have a perfect cast, or a lot of action, but the lines are funny and we can make this play fun by getting into it. changing our play this late is a dumb idea. what can we accomplish by kicking reynolds out and changing the play and recasting and all? nothing its just a waste of time because no matter what all of these 45 minute plays suck because they are only 45 minutes. the best we can do is just to take what we have and make it fun. if the stagecrew comes up with inventive ideas for the set and all of the actors work hard with each other in coaching each other through the lines, then it will end up being a lot of fun. apple-throwing doesnt make play, it makes us look like a bunch of children who need supervision backstage because we have no self control. its jsut so frusterating because everyone is making the play look bad and bringing everyone down with it. i think the plot is dumb, too, because it is too much to handle in that short amount of time but its what we have and i deffinitely think people will understand and think its funny. we just need to make it fun. so all i have to say to those"this play is going to blow/ reynolds should step down/why dont we raise a revolt and protest against this play" slackers is just let it go, sometimes you need to make the best of what you have and find the good in it.

thats all, fin

i just had a depressing thought. i was reading someone's lj, i will not specify their name just because i am lazy like that and it was all fun and cool, like how i could never get mine because i do not have the techno skills for that kind of stuff and i realized that they had so many comments. all were people i didnt recognize. i dont know why i expected to recognize any of them, but maybe i expected to recognize one. i dont know, either way it got me thinking about if i am ever going to get out of here. like the dreams im chasing are pretty fast. you have to catch them at the right moment and what if i miss it and become a failure. i have a plan b, but its also something that isn't exactly stable. more than anything i want to be onstage, but what if i dont do it. like what if im just not the right person for it, like the girl in Fame who had been a ballet dancer all her life, then junior year, her teacher tells her that she just doesnt have it. what if i jsut dont have it. i mean i can make it here in lunenburg i guess. but what about in Boston, NY London, Paris. its just a lot to live up to and i feel like im falling just this {} short of the grade, you know?

i dont know, it just brought me down thinking about never getting out of here and if i do, having to do it alone. then i was talking to someone a few nights ago, i forget who and they were talking about how, when you leave for college you lose all of your high school friends. i just cant imagine that happening. i mean, i love my friends more than my own family sometimes and i dont know why i would ever lose them because they mean so much to me. how could anyone just fall out fo touch with the person they spent their childhood with? it boggles my mind. 

im sorry i dont mean to bore you all ( as if there really was an audience reading this). i guess this was just for me, just to get it out and have it be somewhere but not have to write it in my real journal, its too depressing for it. im wondering about all the questions i still have and if they ever get answered. like what am i doing here? is there some purpose i am supposed to fulfill, i know i have one that i would like to fulfill but am i supposed to fulfill that specific one. or is there not a divine plan at all? are we jsut floating around out here with no guidance or direction. maybe im just going insane from all these Airborne/ Cold-eeze/ tylenol extra strength cold medicines im on. either way...

c'est le fin
